csg.statistics package¶

Submodules¶

csg.statistics.FDR module¶

csg.statistics.FDR.padjust_bh(pvalues)¶
csg.statistics.FDR.padjust_qvalue(pvalues)¶

csg.statistics.invnorm module¶

csg.statistics.invnorm.inverse_normalize¶

Inverse normalize an array of values.

The array should be a numpy array of type long or double (np.int64 or np.float64)

csg.statistics.invnorm.rank_ties_random¶

Sorts a vector, but breaks ties at random.

This is mainly only applicable for vectors with many ties that you may want to ultimately inverse normalize.

NaN values are ranked last.

This function only operates on numpy arrays of type long or double (np.int64 or np.float64)
